Class PietsGrafieken.Builder

java.lang.Object
pietsgrafieken.PietsGrafieken.Builder
Enclosing class:
PietsGrafieken
public static class PietsGrafieken.Builder extends Object
class Builder is an easy way to create the graph. It has for any parameter xx a .withXX-method

    • withXmin

      public PietsGrafieken.Builder withXmin(double xmin)
      determines the minimum x of the graph
      Parameters:
      xmin - a double default = 0
      Returns:
      Builder, namely this, so that these with-methods can be chained

    • withXmax

      public PietsGrafieken.Builder withXmax(double xmax)
      determines the maximum x of the graph
      Parameters:
      xmax - a double default = 4;
      Returns:
      Builder, namely this, so that these with-methods can be chained

    • withyMin

      determines the minimum y of the graph
      Parameters:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Builder, namely this, so that these with-methods can be chained

    • withPanelwidth

      public PietsGrafieken.Builder withPanelwidth(int panelWidth)
      gives the width of the graph-panel in pixels this value also determines the number of points calculated for each function within the given bounds
      Parameters:
      panelWidth - the witdth of the graph
      Returns:
      this, so that these with-metods can be chained

    • withPietsFunction

      public PietsGrafieken.Builder withPietsFunction(PietsGrafieken.PietsFunction f)
      adds a PietsFunction to the list of PietsFunctions
      Parameters:
      f - a PietsFunction
      Returns:
      this, so that these with-metods can be chained

    • build

      public JFrame build()
      transforms this Builder into a JFrame, ready to be displayed
      Returns:
